# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d3943-102">Mencetak lampiran di Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d3943-103">Buka pesan yang berisi lampiran yang ingin Anda cetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="d3943-104">Memindahkan kursor Anda di atas lampiran dan memilih ikon **tindakan lainnya**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d3943-105">> **Unduh**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="d3943-106">Setelah file diunduh, buka dengan program yang sesuai dan pilih opsi untuk dicetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d3943-107">Misalnya, buka file. doc di Word, lalu cetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d3943-108">Untuk informasi selengkapnya, baca [mencetak pesan email, lampiran, dan kalender di Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3943-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
